{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Echostar |model=Wireless Joey Access Point |revision=2 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=02/29/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WA8001B |manuf_rev=AC2 |availability=common |type=access point |fcc_id=RAXWA8001BAC2 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.46 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Quantenna |cpu1_model=QT3840BC |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |fla1_num= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GC16EWXD-12H |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=MU-MIMO |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=an+ac |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Joey Access Point 2}}
*''Arcadyan WA8001BAC2'' FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RAXWA8001BAC2 RAXWA8001BAC2] (02/29/2016) :''[[Echostar Wireless Joey Access Point 2]]'' (12V/1.46A) 1x LAN (RTL8211E)
*''Arcadyan WA8001BAC'' FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RAXWA8001BAC RAXWA8001BAC] (05/31/2015) :"WA8001BAC44-ON" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. :Model: ''[[Airsonics GXT542U]]'' 4x4 Video bridge
See also [[ASUS RT-AC87U]] (''Arcadyan'' WG9117AAC44-ASU)..
*[[Quantenna]] [http://www.quantenna.com/qsr-1000.html QSR1000]: SoC QT3840BC + RFIC QT2518B :CPU: [[Quantenna]] QT3840BC @500MHz SoC :WLAN: [[Quantenna]] QT2518B 802.11ac 4T4R (1733Mbps) :RAM: 128MB, Flash: 16MB, Eth: [[Realtek]] RTL8211E
